sentences.sContent: Geologists describe the motion of the plates and the consequences of such motion as plate tectonics .
sentences.sContent_eng: Geologists describe the motion of the plates and the consequences of such motion as plate tectonics .
sentences.sCn: 地质学家把板块运动及这种运动所造成的后果看作是板块构造运动。

remMethod.val: tect(遮蔽) + on + ics → 被地球表面遮蔽的 → 地质构造

words.tran: [地质] 构造的；建筑的；地壳构造上的
